item.title: New Posts Coming Soon!
item.description: I’ll add some new posts to this site eventually! For now, check out a bit more about me and subscribe to my RSS feed.

About This Site This site is primarily a personal site created for whatever thoughts and projects I want to talk about. I’ll periodically upload new content whenever I have something interesting to discuss, such as a project I worked on at university or an open source project outside of it. I may also upload posts discussing sociological issues and whatever else may be on my mind. Contents: A bit about me Recommended hardware Recommended software A bit about me I’m currently an undergrad CS student at NJIT.
